locations.Fire Temple Near Boss Chest:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or Fairy))
locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and
                ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(2)))) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))))

exits.Fire Temple Boss Room:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and 
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                (Hover_Boots and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                (at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))))

events.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door:
is_adult and
                ((Bombs and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))) or
                (has_bombchus and(Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))))

locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Doo:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or Fairy))
locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door C:
is_adult and 'Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door' and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))
locations.Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room:
is_adult and
                ((can_play(Song_of_Time) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))) or
                (logic_fire_song_of_time and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))))

exits.Fire Temple Middle:
is_adult and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4) and
                (((has_explosives or Bow) and
                    ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                    (logic_fire_strength and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))))) or
                (Progressive_Hookshot and
                    ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                    (logic_fire_strength and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))))))

exits.Fire Temple Upper:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or 
                ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 7) and
                    ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or logic_fire_flame_maze))

locations.Fire Temple Highest Goron Chest:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or (logic_rusted_switches and 
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots) or has_explosives)))
